data.title: Jesse James: “Cheating on Sandra Bullock was a mistake”
data.meta_description: Jesse James had multiple affairs he had while he was married to Sandra Bullock, but the Hollywood bad boy now claims that the incidents were “a mistake”
data.text:
Jesse James had multiple affairs while he was married to Sandra Bullock, but the Hollywood bad boy now regrets the incidents and claims they were "a mistake".

The famed lothario confessed that he felt Bullock didn't love him anymore and therefore sabotaged their marriage because of it.

RELATIONSHIP NIGHTMARES - when A-list romance goes wrong

He said: "There wasn't any kind of ulterior motive. It was just a mistake. I was kind of caught in my own bulls**t. I never thought about the repercussions, there was some fear there but I didn't have my head on straight. "[Those feelings are] all from me because I never loved myself. I never thought highly of myself. I never considered myself successful or anything."

James also hit back at critics who say he has moved on too quickly into another marriage after he announced his engagement to tattooist Kat Von D.

CELEBRITY WEDDINGS - from the tasteful to the tacky
